From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Well, unless some more people (Minimum 15) show support for a 
gladiator tournmanet, there will not be one.  For anyone of you 
reading this thinking that you would like to participate in a 
tournament once everything's ready, nothing will be worked on until 
enough people show interest.

If we get to 15 people interested and depending on how the votes 
were cast, I might have to open another poll to decide how many 
scenarios in the tournament and start having a discussion about which 
scenarios should be included.

If no person would mind sticking their necks out on the current 
tournament poll, I would adjust it to show who has voted so I could 
count those who claim to be unable to reach the poll.

Why 15 people?  Putting together a tournament would take a lot of 
effort and I feel having less than 15 people wouldn't make the effort 
worth while.  If anyone would want to argue the point about miminium 
number of participants, please plead your case.
